segments.text: My attention is drawn to the boy precariously balanced on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the "COOKIE JAR" in the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it's about to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is stretched, one hand already in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a risky climb, especially for a small child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't he realize the danger he's in, or is the allure of cookies too strong?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually quite anxious watching him; a fall could be nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so determined, completely focused on his sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me wince just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would steady that stool before he tumbles down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
